comments: Smart guy but just wish he\'d take into consideration . that we are still LEARNING about this material instead of just assuming we understand everything and moving quickly. Tests are ridiculous even after studying for a week and a half and are pretty long.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
stu_tags: TEST HEAVY  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Tests are on an unreasonable amount of material, 2 tests to cover 15 chapters worth of information. Group project can boost your grade up a bit, but the quantity of the tests will almost surely bring you down.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  GRADED BY FEW THINGS  CARING
comments: Over the semester, we had 2 midterms and a final with 15 CHAPTERS OF MATERIAL. Investments are not hard, but when there are 7+ chapters on an exam, it\'s more difficult than it should be. His exams are also VERY long, I never could finish in time even with the notes we could bring in. He\'s a very nice guy but the class structure could\'ve been better

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: Quite certan the man is an android. No help on questions, just tells you to study. Had this man my senior year and he was terrible. Learned nothing. I now work in investments (have series7, 66, and working on CFP) this man did not help at all. Take the other investments instructor if you want a job in the finance field

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
stu_tags: GROUP PROJECTS  TOUGH GRADER  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA
comments: Dr. Mobbs is very knowledgable in the field of finance. Go to class, study notes, and complete practice problemstests. Be prepared to complete group project. Work with group and do not wait until last minute. Attendance is taken by when he calls on you to answer a question. Not the easiest course.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: Dr. Mobbs was very helpful outside of class. Always encouraged questions in class if you were confused. Optional final. Group project was a little stressful, but not too bad if you stay on top of things. Front and back "cheat sheet" for tests and quizzes. Overall Great teacher, would recommend!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: Great teacher and experience! Best finance class I have taken yet. I learned a lot in this class and the end of semester project helps you to put all of your investment management knowledge together and is a really good learning experience. Dr. Mobbs wants you to do well in his class but you have to try. Dr. Mobbs won\'t let you down! :)

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: There is no final at the end of the semester, just a group presentation. The practice tests he gives out are just like the tests. Very easy class to pass.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: Very smart guy. Easy to see he likes what he\'s teaching. Practice tests are very helpful in this class. Material can be dry during class but slides have blanks, so follow along. If you don\'t actually like finance you won\'t like this course. Very informative class. No final. Strongly recommend for all Finance majors.Overall class+professor: 9/10.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: I really like this subject but his lecture is very boring. You can tell that he is an intelligent man but it is hard to keep alert. All of his notes are online and he posts practice tests. I would recommend someone else but he is the only one who teaches this course. His area of study is managerial compensation but he\'s teaching investments.
